@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Aura]{Aura}

The beheaded constantly whispers twisted incantations in unknown languages secret and foul. Foes that enter or begin their turn in the area must succeed at a Will save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1}. The aura uses the moderate DC for the beheaded's level.
